GameModel

Class SunWand

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Item
      • GameModel.Consumable
        • GameModel.SunWand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SunWand
extends Consumable
    A Sun Wand is used to change the light of a room. If there is already sunlight in the room, do not do anything. However, if the room is dark, light the room up for 10 seconds.
    Author:
    Mike Hogue
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
